cRefPattern.p: This pattern references a specific line.
This pattern references an inscribed surface on an object.

div.l: By means of your “affirmed heart,” you will be able to quarrel with me?
After you made yourself violent against me(?)
Like a cauldron, I want to open myself, after/by means of boasting(?)
Stand, I want to put an end to your abuse
Your counsel is of ..., ecstatic(?), liar
... the brigands are plundering the front(?) of the city
... are the taboo of working(?)
... to be ... are set/placed(?)
Do not ... for the account for me(?)
... not pondered
... dwelling in the ... of Inanna(?), ...
... daily he follows(?), ...
... exuberant(?) merchant, possessing silver and barley ...
... the man of the lubšir sack(?) (for carrying money)(?) ...
... gives ...
... the child of a merchant/member of the merchant's ranks ...
You do not ...
Like a person whose head is half shaved, you have had no dignity
You have not deliberated, you have not advised yourself
You did not diminish(?) the word in you heart
As if insulted, you have not said “do not speak”
